setting.name: HPPaperTypeSubstitute
setting.single-valid-value: true if not HPColorMode in {colorsync,application-managed}; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPPaperTypeSubstitute1
setting.single-valid-value: true if not HPPenConfig in {black}; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPPaperType
setting.valid-values: automatic: HPPaperTypeSubstitute in {true} and /* automatic is not allowed with colorsync*/ ((not HPPhysicalPaperSize has attribute "$Root/capabilities/constrained-media-types/disallowed-media-types[@name=$Self/disallowed-media-types/@ref-name]/reference[@name='%*%']") and /* it's not disallowed by the paper size and */ ((not HPPaperSource has attribute "allowed-media-types" and not HPPaperSource has attribute "disallowed-media-types") or (HPPaperSource has attribute "allowed-media-types/reference[@name='%*%']") or (not HPPaperSource has attribute "allowed-media-types" and HPPaperSource has attribute "disallowed-media-types" and HPPaperSource not has attribute "$Root/capabilities/constrained-media-types/disallowed-media-types[@name=$Self/disallowed-media-types/@ref-name]/reference[@name='%*%']")) and (( HPPaperTypeSubstitute1 in {true}) or (* has attribute "media-type-info/@black-only[.='true']"))); *: (not HPPhysicalPaperSize has attribute "$Root/capabilities/constrained-media-types/disallowed-media-types[@name=$Self/disallowed-media-types/@ref-name]/reference[@name='%*%']") and /* it's not disallowed by the paper size and */ ((not HPPaperSource has attribute "allowed-media-types" and not HPPaperSource has attribute "disallowed-media-types") or (HPPaperSource has attribute "allowed-media-types/reference[@name='%*%']") or (not HPPaperSource has attribute "allowed-media-types" and HPPaperSource has attribute "disallowed-media-types" and HPPaperSource not has attribute "$Root/capabilities/constrained-media-types/disallowed-media-types[@name=$Self/disallowed-media-types/@ref-name]/reference[@name='%*%']")) and (( HPPaperTypeSubstitute1 in {true}) or (* has attribute "media-type-info/@black-only[.='true']"));

setting.name: HPPenConfigEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: mutable-enabled if (Printer has attribute ".//installable-option[@name='HPPenConfig']"); mutable-hidden otherwise;

setting.name: HPGrayscaleMode
